{"name": "Zion Christian Assembly", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please bring your picture ID and your cell phone.

Households will only be allowed to come once a month.

We will only be serving 30 families on each pantry day - first come, first served (get there early!).

In order to be served, you must be present.
